thread.section_title: Viking Bags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Viking Bags | vikingbags.com | 3 of 136
thread.title: Inkdemt

author: Inkdemt
title: Inkdemt
text: The bags are awesome, my only complaint is if you don't have a second pair of hands it will be difficult, and also the hardware supplied did not work with the welded nuts underneath the fender,mod two trips had to be made to the Hardware store. This problem may be only for the Honda VTX fitted bags, also page one of the written instructions was not for my type of bag, so that made it somewhat confusing.
